explanation: [0-0] In a room decorated with a fake cloud ceiling, illuminated by white crystal lamps and blue beams near the windows, the walls are painted in white and yellowish-brown. Two large green curtains hang on the wall, and there are green plants in the room. A group of people is sitting not far from the camera, some on sofas and others on chairs.

[0-3] They are chatting when suddenly, a man in a black short-sleeved shirt is flung into the air by the black sofa, startling those around him. The black seat part of the sofa is also thrown up, revealing a large white bubble-like object at the bottom of the sofa. Then, the camera switches to the bar counter's perspective, where a black long cushion and a mobile phone are placed on the yellow countertop. The scene of the man being ejected from the seat is replayed.
